title.rendered: Trilax 100 GMS Herbal natural remedy for Gas, Bloating, and Constipation

content.rendered:
• TRILAX Powder offers a gentle yet effective solution for relieving constipation, promoting regular and comfortable bowel movements.
  • Experience relief from gastric discomfort and acidity, addressing digestive issues, Gas, Bloating, belching that commonly associated with constipation.
  • Natural Ayurvedic Formulation: Crafted with a fine powder of Ayurvedic herbs, provides a natural and holistic approach to digestive health.
  • Safe and effective TRILAX powder is designed to provide relief without any side effects, ensuring a gentle and natural approach to digestive health.
  • TRILAX Powder is a fine blend of Ayurvedic herbs selected for their digestive benefits, ensuring a comprehensive and natural approach to constipation relief.
Benefits:
  • May help in giving Relief from unsatisfactory bowel habit naturally.
  • support in removing Toxins.
  • Helps to reduce Bloating & Discomfort.
  • Helps to improve Metabolism.
Ingredients: Senna Leaves, Black Salt, Amla, Aj wain, Hime, Svarikshar, Jethimach, Nisot.
Direction of use:“Take 3-5 gms powder at bedtime or as advised by the physician.”
Legal Disclaimer: This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. This product is a dietary supplement, not medicine.
